tag_list: photography, commercial, editorial, fine-art, stock-photography, wedding-photography, photorexit-photography
overview:
Photorexit Photography, owned and operated by Jason M. Reese, provides a cross-pollination of fine art photography and photojournalism for his clients that has earned him a distinguished reputation in the wedding world. With an astute mastery of photography’s formal qualities and a vision seasoned by intuition and artistic mastery, Jason’s work appeals to the modern bride whose concerns are centered around simple, elegant images that compel and recite stories without words.

Services include - Wedding, Corporate Event, Editorial, Architecture, Commercial, Portrait, Fine Art, Travel, and Stock Photography.

“My approach to all photographic/visual projects is always unique, as it is tailored to the client’s needs, expectations, and personal vision.”

“I embark upon assignments relying most heavily on my visual intuition; a curious and discerning eye that has been refined by many years of formal training and education. I’m interested in not only meeting my client’s expectations, but more importantly, surpassing them.”

“My personal style could be summed up as visceral and evocative. I believe my images to be distinctive due to the blending and integration of various photographic disciplines to which my eye has been trained, i.e. commercial, documentary, and fine art.”
